text: Qhiyaama ugutah tablen ayró ummaan barray baxa qarissa, qarissa baxa hawwentaah kaak garcittah gibdaabinak tet geyteemih sabbatah, kaadu ummaan barray bagut-le bagut lem qiddaah fanak xalta, kaadu atu sinam yiskireeh doomite marih innal ken tableeh, usun nummah yiskireeh doomite mara hinnon, kinnih immay Yallih digaaláy gibdî sabbatah hawri keenik gexe
